WorkItem.Description: When WPP crash, allow user to send debug info to help fix the App.
WorkItem.Summary: Add ability to send debug info

Comments.Message: This Tool is a very very good idea! Hope it help solve problems.

I hope so. The problem is that unregister people can't open a ticket on this site. So many user don't report bug. And people who report bug put a very short description of what they do to reproduce the bug.

I think it will be easier for me with this tool.
With a Microsoft ID (Live ID) everyone can logon here. Maybe you can add a function to 'Send' a report.
You can go to 'help' then 'send support data'
